SELECT p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_code, p.p_category, p.p_unit, p.stock as current_stock, COALESCE(p.min_stock, 0) as min_stock, COALESCE(p.max_stock, 999999) as max_stock, CASE WHEN p.stock <= 0 THEN '缺货' WHEN p.stock <= COALESCE(p.min_stock, 0) THEN '不足' ELSE '充足' END as stock_status, p.s_id, s.s_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN supplier s ON p.s_id = s.s_id
AND p.p_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pName}, '%')
AND p.p_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pCode}, '%')
AND p.p_category = #{pCategory}
ORDER BY p.p_id

SELECT p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_code, p.p_category, p.p_unit, p.stock as current_stock, COALESCE(p.min_stock, 0) as min_stock, COALESCE(p.max_stock, 999999) as max_stock, CASE WHEN p.stock <= 0 THEN '缺货' WHEN p.stock <= COALESCE(p.min_stock, 0) THEN '不足' ELSE '充足' END as stock_status, p.s_id, s.s_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN supplier s ON p.s_id = s.s_id WHERE p.p_id = #{value}

SELECT p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_code, p.p_category, p.p_unit, p.stock as current_stock, COALESCE(p.min_stock, 0) as min_stock, COALESCE(p.max_stock, 999999) as max_stock, '不足' as stock_status, p.s_id, s.s_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN supplier s ON p.s_id = s.s_id WHERE p.stock <= COALESCE(p.min_stock, 0) OR p.stock = 0 ORDER BY p.stock ASC, p.p_id
